settings.title: Care Instruction
settings.richtxt:
To keep your Teevore My Tee looking fresh and lasting long, follow these simple care tips:

Machine wash cold with like colors

Use mild detergent

Do not bleach

Turn inside out before washing to protect the print

Avoid tumble drying — hang dry for best results

Iron inside out on low heat — do not iron on print


Your tee deserves love — care for it right, and it’ll stay with you for the long haul.

settings.title: Shipping Information
settings.richtxt:
We aim to get your favorite tees to you as quickly and safely as possible!

Order Processing Time: All orders are processed within 1–2 business days.

Shipping Time: Once dispatched, delivery typically takes 3–7 business days, depending on your location.

Tracking: A tracking link will be shared with you via email/SMS once your order is shipped.

Shipping Charges: Shipping is free on all prepaid orders. COD (Cash on Delivery) may include an additional fee.

Note: During peak sale periods or unforeseen delays (weather, courier issues), shipments may take slightly longer. We appreciate your patience.

settings.title: Return Information
settings.richtxt:
Please note:
*Sale variants are not eligible for return or exchange.
*Orders placed during sales cannot be modified.

We’re committed to making sure you love what you wear! If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, we offer a hassle-free 7-day return and exchange policy — no questions asked.

Simply visit our Return Dashboard to initiate your request, and we'll take care of the rest.

For more information, please refer to our complete return policy here.

Shop with confidence. We've got your back.

settings.title: LuxeSoft
settings.text: Ultra-soft texture that feels luxurious against the skin.

settings.title: True Durability
settings.text: Built to last while remaining lightweight & breathable for all-day wear.

settings.title: The Defining Touch
settings.text: The Defining Touch brings together fit, comfort, and style. Luxuriously soft fabric with a subtle sheen ensures lasting elegance. Crafted to maintain shape and withstand wear, it’s a t-shirt that stands apart.
